translation.en: Council pickings. It's all we've got.
translation.zh: 市里选的地方 我们别无选择

translation.en: You can't carry her up and down every day. She's gonna be stuck.
translation.zh: 你可不能每天这样把她搬上搬下的 -她会被困住的-她不想惹麻烦

translation.en: She doesn't want the fuss. She's happy to be home.
translation.zh: -她会被困住的-她不想惹麻烦 能回家她就知足了

translation.en: [Barbara] The Happy Crip and other myths that are good to share.
translation.zh: 知足的瘸子与其他应该讲出来分享的迷思

translation.en: Accessible housing was inaccessible.
translation.zh: 找到无障碍住宅是如此大的障碍

translation.en: You either couldn't get a job or, if you did,
translation.zh: 你要么干脆找不到工作 就算你找到了 也不敢打电话请病假

translation.en: you wouldn't dare call in sick.
translation.zh: 就算你找到了 也不敢打电话请病假

translation.en: And with no ramps on buses and shitty stairs in train stations,
translation.zh: 巴士上没有坡道火车站里也只有破烂的楼梯

translation.en: the only way we could get anywhere was cadging a lift with mates.
translation.zh: 我们想去任何地方的唯一方法就是找朋友来载你一程

translation.en: -Give me a hand getting this stuff in. -First your cabby, now your porter?
translation.zh: 来嘛 朋友 帮我把东西装进去 刚做完司机现在又要当你的搬运工了？

translation.en: -I even invited you to stay at mine. -All right?
translation.zh: -我还邀请你去我家住呢-你好啊？

translation.en: You all right?
translation.zh: 你好吗？

translation.en: Fun as it would be, choosing between top and tailing
translation.zh: 虽说跟你和你妈妈一起挤一张床是挺有趣的

translation.en: with you and your mum, I found a better offer.
translation.zh: 虽说跟你和你妈妈一起挤一张床是挺有趣的 我找到了更好的去处

translation.en: [Barbara] Pissing it down. Hurry up!
translation.zh: 下着大雨呢 跨店

translation.en: -Look after him. He needs a bath! -[Barbara] Yeah, yeah. -All right? Mwah! -[Alan chuckles]
translation.zh: -照顾好他 他需要洗个澡！-嗯 你没事吧？

translation.en: -[Barbara] Get a move on! -[Alan] Hey! Billy! Billy, you wanker!
translation.zh: 好了 快去吧！ 喂！比利！比利 你个傻逼！

translation.en: -[Barbara cackles] -[Billy] Gotta go, mate. -Found a better offer! -[Alan] Billy!
translation.zh: -要走了 朋友 找到了更好的去处！-比利！

translation.en: Pick it up.
translation.zh: 捡起来

translation.en: Welcome back.
translation.zh: 欢迎回来

translation.en: -[Barbara] It's on the back of my sofa! -[Alan] They're playing the violins now.
translation.zh: -都搞到我沙发背后去了！-他们都放起小提琴来了

translation.en: [Barbara] Every two years, Alan and his mates got together
translation.zh: 每隔两年 艾伦和他的朋友们会聚到一起看独立电视台电视马拉松的笑话

translation.en: to hate-watch the ITV telethon.
translation.zh: 艾伦和他的朋友们会聚到一起看独立电视台电视马拉松的笑话

translation.en: Twenty-eight hours of well-intentioned do-gooders
translation.zh: 整整28小时 一帮出于善意的老好人

translation.en: dangling us poor crips in front of the nation's bleeding hearts.
translation.zh: 将我们这帮可怜的瘸子在全国上下好心人的面前游街

translation.en: Basically, 28 hours of hardcore inspiration porn.
translation.zh: 基本上就是连续28小时的硬核心灵鸡汤

translation.en: -[Barbara] Oh my God, stop it! -Look at him, trying to be grateful.
translation.zh: -我的天啊 住手！-瞧瞧他 装出一副感激的样子来

translation.en: -We all try and look grateful, Billy. -[man] True.
translation.zh: -我们不都会装出感激的样子吗 比利-说得对

translation.en: "Stephen has always wanted to play football."
translation.zh: “史蒂芬从小就梦想着能踢足球”

translation.en: "Thanks to the money raised from the telethon, he now has a wheelchair
translation.zh: “多亏了电视马拉松筹到的钱” 他现在拥有了一辆轮椅让他终于可以…

translation.en: that allows him to--"
translation.zh: 他现在拥有了一辆轮椅让他终于可以…

translation.en: Still not play fucking football!
translation.zh: 依旧踢不了那该死的足球！

translation.en: Oh, look at them zooming in!
translation.zh: 还给他们来了个特写

translation.en: [Billy] His little face.
translation.zh: 他的小脸

translation.en: "How does it feel to still not be playing football, Stephen?"
translation.zh: “依旧没办法踢足球的感觉如何史蒂芬？”

translation.en: -[woman on TV] Help from Telethon-- -I hate this.
translation.zh: 电视马拉松帮助… 我好讨厌这个

translation.en: Wait till you see how many people dial in, weeping pennies for poor Steve.
translation.zh: 等你看到有多少人打电话进来哭着为可怜的史蒂芬捐钱再说吧

translation.en: Why are we watching it?
translation.zh: 我们干嘛看这个啊？

translation.en: Because it's informative and educative to see what they think of us.
translation.zh: 因为看这个能涨知识 有教育意义好知道他们是怎么想我们的

translation.en: Right. Well, turn it off.
translation.zh: 是哦 好了 关掉吧

translation.en: Don't. I wanna see it.
translation.zh: 别关啊 我想看

translation.en: Pity wrapped up in a nice, pink bow.
translation.zh: 被包装好的卖惨再扎上一个粉红蝴蝶结

translation.en: Oi! Watch that rug. It's worth more than you!
translation.zh: 小心我的地毯！这比你人还值钱呢

translation.en: Oh! Oh, hey! Chris fucking Tarrant!
translation.zh: 嘿！是他妈的克里斯·塔伦特

translation.en: [man] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[Barbara] No. No, no, no. -[Alan] What?
translation.zh: -不行！-干嘛啊？

translation.en: -[Barbara] No more. My house, my rules. -We're gonna miss the good bit!
translation.zh: -不能看了 我的家我做主-我们要错过最好看的部分了！

translation.en: They're gonna have the talking guide dog on soon.
translation.zh: 他们马上要请会说话的向导犬上来了

translation.en: -I don't like it. -Oh!
translation.zh: 我不喜欢

translation.en: [Billy] At school, I wasn't allowed to eat with the other kids.
translation.zh: 在学校里他们不允许我跟其他孩子坐一起吃饭

translation.en: My chair wasn't compatible to the canteen table, and they were fixed to the floor.
translation.zh: 我坐轮椅没办法在餐厅的桌子上吃饭它们全都是固定在地面上的

translation.en: So I ate alone in the science lab with a teacher called Mr. Hendrix.
translation.zh: 于是 我只能独自一人 跟亨德里克老师一起在科学实验室里吃饭

translation.en: Mr. Hendrix asked me to call him Neil six months in. He was my mate.
translation.zh: 六个月后亨德里克老师跟我说叫他尼尔就行了 他是我的朋友

translation.en: My only mate.
translation.zh: 我唯一的朋友

translation.en: That's what being disabled is all about. That's what they should show.
translation.zh: 这才是身为残疾人的生活他们应该拍这个才对

translation.en: -Neil? -[Alan laughs]
translation.zh: 尼尔？

translation.en: -Kneel for Neil! -[laughter]
translation.zh: 为尼尔下跪！

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, yeah. He only had me in the cellar on Wednesdays.
translation.zh: 好啦 好啦他只有周三会去酒窖里要我

translation.en: -[laughter] -Dirty fucker!
translation.zh: 猥琐的混蛋！

translation.en: [Barbara] You could say, and you'd be right to ask, "What's wrong with charity?"
translation.zh: 当然 你可能会说…也应该要问 做慈善有什么不对？

translation.en: I'll tell you what's wrong.
translation.zh: 我告诉你有什么不对

translation.en: It sees us as victims.
translation.zh: 这把我们当成了受害者来看待

translation.en: Passive victims who need your help.
translation.zh: 消极被动的受害者 急需你的帮助

translation.en: But that's fucked up. We're not fucking useless.
translation.zh: 可这也太操蛋了我们又不是他妈的废物

translation.en: It's society that's disabling.
translation.zh: 使人残疾的 是这个社会

translation.en: If the world was designed a little better, we wouldn't need help.
translation.zh: 要是这个世界能设计得再好那么一点我们就不需要帮助了

translation.en: We could support ourselves.
translation.zh: 我们就能照顾我们自己

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Charity is giving pennies to the pot when the kitchen's on fire.
translation.zh: 慈善仅仅是杯水车薪

translation.en: Rights, not charity. That's what we need.
translation.zh: 我们需要的是权利 不是救济

translation.en: Oh! Fuck!
translation.zh: 操！

translation.en: -Caliper. -Barb?
translation.zh: -矫形器-芭芭？

translation.en: Every time.
translation.zh: 每次都是

translation.en: -Bad news. -Hmm?
translation.zh: 坏消息

translation.en: [Barbara] The toilet's blocked.
translation.zh: 厕所堵住了

translation.en: Other news. I might be pregnant.
translation.zh: 还有个消息 我可能怀孕了

translation.en: Right.
translation.zh: 是哦

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吧？

translation.en: I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我很好啊

translation.en: You okay?
translation.zh: 你还好吗？

translation.en: I'm okay.
translation.zh: 我很好

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: Because I've got an idea.
translation.zh: 因为我想到了个主意

translation.en: About what?
translation.zh: 什么主意？

translation.en: You know they've just given the bus station a new paint job?
translation.zh: 你知道他们刚给汽车站漆完新漆吧？

translation.en: And?
translation.zh: 然后呢？

translation.en: Keep it down, for God's sake!
translation.zh: 轻一点 看在上帝的份上

translation.en: What on earth is that?
translation.zh: 这到底是什么玩意啊？

translation.en: You'll see.
translation.zh: 等下你就知道了

translation.en: -[Barbara] Shit! -[Alan] Transport for all!
translation.zh: -糟糕！-让交通人人可用！

translation.en: [Billy] Go, go, go! Move, move! Transport for all!
translation.zh: 快！跑！让交通人人可用！

translation.en: -Make way! -[Barbara] Transport for all! Transport for all!
translation.zh: -让开！-让交通人人可用！

translation.en: ♪ What a waste! But I don't mind… ♪
translation.zh: （让交通人人可用）

translation.en: Your solicitor isn't picking up.
translation.zh: 你们的律师不接电话你们只能先等了

translation.en: -You'll have to wait to be discharged. -Right you are, officer.
translation.zh: 你们的律师不接电话你们只能先等了 没问题 警官

translation.en: Are you okay, both in here? It's just there's steps down to the cells and--
translation.zh: 你们俩没事吧 待在这里面？ 要下去牢房那里有好几阶楼梯要走…

translation.en: You want us to kip in your van?
translation.zh: 你想让我们睡在你的厢车里？

translation.en: [policeman] It's just a couple of hours till the shift change.
translation.zh: 再过几小时就要换班了

translation.en: No, it is our legal right to be put in a cell.
translation.zh: 不行 被关进牢房里是我们的合法权利 而且…

translation.en: -And-- -It's two hours. We'll cope.
translation.zh: 两小时而已 我们可以的

translation.en: Thank you. I've put your wheelchair behind reception.
translation.zh: 谢谢 我会把你的轮椅放在前台后面

translation.en: I'll check on ya.
translation.zh: 我会回来看你们的

translation.en: [Barbara] Thanks!
translation.zh: 多谢！

translation.en: I think I love you.
translation.zh: 我想我爱你

translation.en: Come on then. You're supposed to say it back now.
translation.zh: 拜托 现在轮到你回复我同样的话了

translation.en: Maybe later.
translation.zh: 以后再说吧

translation.en: I'm gonna keep it.
translation.zh: 我打算生下来

translation.en: -Good. -Hmm.
translation.zh: 好啊

translation.en: I mean, it's your body and…
translation.zh: 毕竟 这是你自己的身体

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: -And, you know, we can still protest. -Yes.
translation.zh: 我们可以继续抗议的 没错 要生这个孩子并不代表这种生活就要停止

translation.en: Having this baby won't make life stop.
translation.zh: 没错 要生这个孩子并不代表这种生活就要停止

translation.en: Because I think we can do something special here.
translation.zh: 因为我觉得我们可以成就一番事业的

translation.en: Can we?
translation.zh: 我们可以吗？

translation.en: Yes! Yes, yes!
translation.zh: 可以

translation.en: Trouble is, what was that meant to achieve?
translation.zh: 问题是刚才那样是要达成什么目的？

translation.en: Fuck them for spending money on a paint job
translation.zh: 去他妈的 他们宁可在新油漆上花钱

translation.en: instead of actually solving access.
translation.zh: 也不愿意好好解决无障碍的问题

translation.en: -That's what the point of-- -Buses are small.
translation.zh: -这就是这件事的意义…-巴士很小

translation.en: Buses are vital.
translation.zh: 巴士很重要

translation.en: -If people can't get on 'em-- -We need to think bigger.
translation.zh: 如果人们没办法坐… 我们需要想得更大一些

translation.en: Transport is the most visible thing.
translation.zh: 交通是最显眼的东西

translation.en: If we get transport right, then we can shine a light--
translation.zh: 要是我们能把交通的问题解决了就能让大家注意到…

translation.en: Let's take disability from the health pages to the front pages.
translation.zh: 让我们把残疾从健康版推到头版上去

translation.en: Okay, Rupert Murdoch.
translation.zh: 好的 鲁伯特·默多克

translation.en: Let's take down the telethon.
translation.zh: 我们干掉《电视马拉松》吧

translation.en: Holy shit.
translation.zh: 我的天啊

translation.en: [Barbara] We decided we would block Telethon and mobilize every crip we could find.
translation.zh: 我们决定要把《电视马拉松》动员了我们能找到的每一个瘸子

translation.en: But as there was no crip section in the Yellow Pages,
translation.zh: 但黄页上可没有瘸子专页

translation.en: it was about connects.
translation.zh: 人脉是最重要的

translation.en: Find a crip, make a crip a friend,
translation.zh: 找到一个瘸子 让瘸子去找他的朋友

translation.en: build a crip alliance.
translation.zh: 建立一个瘸子联盟

translation.en: People wanted to know why we were fighting,
translation.zh: 人们想知道 我们在为什么而抗争

translation.en: so I went on some TV talk shows.
translation.zh: 于是我去参加了某个电视访谈节目

translation.en: Just slow down a minute!
translation.zh: 你慢一点好不好！

translation.en: Let's just catch our breaths. What do you call it? Strategize.
translation.zh: 我们喘口气 先那个啥 制定一下战略

translation.en: I wanted to be here an hour ago to strategize!
translation.zh: 我一小时前就想过来制定战略了

translation.en: I didn't plan on you holding traffic to a standstill,
translation.zh: 我哪知道你会让整个交通停摆

translation.en: spinning your Calippo around like a lasso.
translation.zh: 像甩绳套似的甩着你那“卡里波”

translation.en: -A Calippo is an ice lolly. -Oh!
translation.zh: “卡里波”是一种冰棍的名字

translation.en: A caliper is a leg brace. And that bus driver should have let us on.
translation.zh: “卡里普尔”才是矫形器那个巴士司机应该让我们上车的

translation.en: -You wanted to teach me a lesson. -I wanted us to get here ourselves.
translation.zh: -你只是想给我个教训-我是想让我们靠自己到这里来

translation.en: And I wanted to look… -Well, not like this! -[Alan sighs]
translation.zh: 那我还想看起来…反正不是现在这样！

translation.en: Not on fucking television! You know what? You stay outside.
translation.zh: 这可是要上他妈电视啊！ 你猜怎么着？你待在外面吧

translation.en: -What? -Strategize how we get home.
translation.zh: -什么？-制定一下我们回家的战略

translation.en: -Gonna get you mic'd up. -Yeah. Um, is there time for makeup?
translation.zh: 帮你把话筒装上 嗯 有时间化一下妆吗？

translation.en: -Um, no, I don't think so. -No?
translation.zh: -不 应该没有了-没有？

translation.en: -Oh, um, watch this-- -[clatter] -Thing. -I'll just push.
translation.zh: -小心这个-我用力推一下

translation.en: Yeah. [chuckles nervously]
translation.zh: 嗯

translation.en: -Right. There we go. -[Barbara groans]
translation.zh: 好了 过来了

translation.en: -Um… -There's another one here. -Okay. -Okay?
translation.zh: -好了 这边还有一个-好的

translation.en: -And here we go. -Right.
translation.zh: -好嘞 过来了-嗯

translation.en: Okay, just…
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: -I'm sorry again for being late. -Oh, no, it's really no problem.
translation.zh: -很抱歉我迟到了-没关系的

translation.en: -Okay. -[TV producer] Final checks.
translation.zh: -好的-最后检查

translation.en: -[woman] Shall we get you into position? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -我们该就位了吗？-嗯

translation.en: I'm… I'm gonna need a bit of…
translation.zh: 我可能需要一点…

translation.en: [woman] Okay, come here. …help here.
translation.zh: -过来-帮一下这边

translation.en: This side. That side, that side. Okay, um, up and forward.
translation.zh: 这边 那边 好了 -向上再向前-即将开始直播 四、三…

translation.en: [producer] Going live in five, four, three…
translation.zh: -向上再向前-即将开始直播 四、三…

translation.en: Take this one. Here we go.
translation.zh: 这边来一下 好了

translation.en: [TV host] Back to us live in the studio.
translation.zh: 回到我们的直播室

translation.en: Now, I'm here with Joe Simpson and Barbara Lisicki
translation.zh: 我请来了乔·辛普森与芭芭拉·希里奇做嘉宾

translation.en: to discuss the upcoming ITV telethon
translation.zh: 一同讨论接下来独立电视台的《电视马拉松》

translation.en: and the protest that's been organized by disabled people all over the country.
translation.zh: 以及全国上下残障人士阻止的抗议活动

translation.en: Joe, what are your thoughts?
translation.zh: 好了 乔 你有什么看法？

translation.en: We're listening and that's why, this year, we're putting emphasis on, uh, the scale
translation.zh: 我们一直在倾听着所以今年我们要把重点放在规模上

translation.en: and the need to not just be concerned with social issues
translation.zh: 我们明白对社会问题的关注不仅仅局限于

translation.en: for the 28 hours of the telethon.
translation.zh: 这28小时的电视马拉松上

translation.en: I mean, we, and all our charities,
translation.zh: 我们 还有我们所有的慈善机构

translation.en: we really care about these voices that are emerging and, you know, we're…
translation.zh: 是真的很关注这些最近发出来的声音 你知道的 我们也在为他们的难处做出相应的调整

translation.en: we're adjusting to, uh… to meet their challenge.
translation.zh: 你知道的 我们也在为他们的难处做出相应的调整

translation.en: Yeah, of… of course.
translation.zh: 是 当然了

translation.en: -Thank you. -[John] Hi.
translation.zh: -谢谢你-嗨

translation.en: -[Barbara] Hi. -[John] And, um, what do you think?
translation.zh: 那你是怎么想的？

translation.en: The telethon is pure "show us your stumps" voyeurism.
translation.zh: 这个电视马拉松完全是一种“让我们看看你截肢处”的偷窥癖

translation.en: It's a parade of begging, drooling cripples
translation.zh: 这是一场流着口水摇尾乞怜的瘸子们的游行

translation.en: displaying their infirmities in return for charity handouts.
translation.zh: 通过展示他们的病痛来换取慈善的救济

translation.en: Uh, Telethon, it's… it's an emotional experience. We're trying to create empathy.
translation.zh: 《电视马拉松》是一场情绪的体验我们想要创造共情

translation.en: Disabled people work with us, and they support what we do.
translation.zh: 我们是在跟残疾人共同合作他们支持我们在做的事

translation.en: I think pity, it's, it's… it's counterproductive.
translation.zh: 我觉得纯粹卖惨是会产生反效果的

translation.en: Uh, both to the wide variety of groups that we're trying to help,
translation.zh: 无论是对我们努力帮助的各种族群

translation.en: but also counterproductive to raising funds.
translation.zh: 还是筹款活动本身

translation.en: Your badly-directed altruism--
translation.zh: 你们错误引导的无私奉献…

translation.en: Let's call it good intentions.
translation.zh: 我们还是称之为一片善意吧

translation.en: Your altruism convinces us that we don't deserve our dignity,
translation.zh: 你们的无私奉献向我们传达的是我们不配拥有自己的尊严

translation.en: our self-respect, and humanity.
translation.zh: 我们不配拥有自尊和人性

translation.en: You spend money on advertising in case we forget who we are,
translation.zh: 你们花了大把大把的钱宣传生怕我们忘了自己是谁

translation.en: and then you book celebrities to come and empathetically pat our heads.
translation.zh: 然后邀请名人过来同情地拍拍我们的头

translation.en: Sounds like you've got a lot to say.
translation.zh: 看来你有很多话要讲

translation.en: Block Telethon is about reclaiming our pride.
translation.zh: “禁播电视马拉松”运动是为了重新夺回我们的自尊

translation.en: It's about equality.
translation.zh: 是为了追求平等

translation.en: It's about celebrating who we are, coming together as people.
translation.zh: 是为了赞颂我们自身作为人类团结起来

translation.en: No more charity.
translation.zh: 不要再搞救济了

translation.en: What we want instead is real rights, real choices.
translation.zh: 我们需要的是真正的权利真正的选择

translation.en: So if you are watching on the day and you want to support us, don't phone.
translation.zh: 所以如果你那天会观看并且想要支援我们的话 就别打电话

translation.en: It hurts our feelings.
translation.zh: 那会伤害我们的感情

translation.en: -If I may-- -Sorry, Joe. I'm gonna have to stop you.
translation.zh: -可是 能不能容我…-抱歉 乔 我不能让你说了

translation.en: We are just about out of time for this week.
translation.zh: 我们这周的节目要结束了

translation.en: Thank you so much to our guests. Thank you for watching. Bye for now.
translation.zh: 非常感谢我们的嘉宾非常感谢大家的观看 我们下周见

translation.en: Whoo! Let me hear some noise!
translation.zh: （电视马拉松在拉皮条拒绝卖惨） 大家大声点！

translation.en: Yeah!
translation.zh: 太好了！

translation.en: [protesters chanting] ITV have got it wrong!
translation.zh: 独立电视台搞错了

translation.en: We don't want your telethon!
translation.zh: 我们不想要你的电视马拉松！

translation.en: ♪ I want choices and rights ♪
translation.zh: 我们想要选择与权利

translation.en: -We don't want your telethon! - ♪ Choices and rights… ♪
translation.zh: -我们不需要你的电视马拉松！-选择与权利

translation.en: Telethon is a magnificent opportunity
translation.zh: 《电视马拉松》是一个绝佳的机会

translation.en: for us to be able to use the medium of television to raise awareness,
translation.zh: 能让我们利用电视这个媒体提高民众的意识

translation.en: to raise issues, to raise funds.
translation.zh: 提高对问题的认知并筹集资金

translation.en: Terrible imagery. Terrible portrayal of disabled people being objects of pity.
translation.zh: 通过糟糕的画面对残疾人糟糕的描绘来卖惨

translation.en: Uh, I don't accept that.
translation.zh: 我不接受这种说法

translation.en: [protesters] Rights, not charity!
translation.zh: 要权利 不要救济！

translation.en: [Barbara] That day, for the first time in the history of this country,
translation.zh: 那一天是这个国家有史以来的第一次

translation.en: thousands of disabled people joined together to say, "No."
translation.zh: 数千名残障人士聚集到一起大声说“不”

translation.en: We couldn't believe it. And neither could ITV.
translation.zh: 我们都不敢相信独立电视台也不敢相信

translation.en: They found us, and we found ourselves.
translation.zh: 他们找到了我们 我们自己找到了

translation.en: An attitude, a way we wanted to be.
translation.zh: 一种态度 一种我们想要的生存方式

translation.en: [man] All those people in the building opposite are begging on our behalf.
translation.zh: 对面这栋建筑里的那些人正在以我们的名义乞讨

translation.en: And if they're listening, we want to tell you,
translation.zh: 如果他们有在听 我们想要告诉你们

translation.en: you don't have our permission.
translation.zh: 你们没有得到我们的允许

translation.en: Block Telethon! Block it! It's shit!
translation.zh: 禁播《电视马拉松》！禁播！垃圾玩意！

translation.en: [protesters chanting] Rights, not charity! Rights, not charity! Rights, not charity!
translation.zh: 要权利 不要救济！

translation.en: I'm going to be digging for eggs with a JCB. You've got to see this.
translation.zh: 我要开着挖掘机去挖蛋了你必须得看一看

translation.en: -Yeah. -Mining for eggs.
translation.zh: 把地里的蛋挖出来

translation.en: -And people stepping to the moon. -[woman] Rights, not charity!
translation.zh: -人们会踩着爬上月亮 天呐-要权利 不要救济！

translation.en: There'll be all sorts of things. -Atlantic 252 are going to be there. -[woman shouting angrily]
translation.zh: 还有各种各样的事亚特兰大252台也会到场

translation.en: Oh, dear. We've got some cross people.
translation.zh: 来了一群愤怒的人

translation.en: [woman] There's disabled people outside opposing this program.
translation.zh: 外面有残疾人在反对这个节目

translation.en: I'll tell you what. We will now see the reason we are doing this program.
translation.zh: 要不这样吧 我们接下来就看看我们做这个节目的原因

translation.en: -Here's another film. Thank you. -They don't want pity!
translation.zh: -下面是一段影片 谢谢-我们不需要怜悯！

translation.en: [Alan] ♪ Choices and rights ♪
translation.zh: 选择与权利

translation.en: ♪ That's what we gotta fight for ♪
translation.zh: 我们就是要为之抗争

translation.en: ♪ Choices and rights… ♪
translation.zh: 选择与权利

translation.en: [protesters chanting] Rights, not charity! Rights, not charity! Rights, not charity! Rights, not charity!
translation.zh: 要权利 不要救济！

translation.en: -Rights, not charity! -[trumpet music]
translation.zh: 要权利 不要救济！

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah! -Come on!
translation.zh: -对！-加油！

translation.en: A little article the next year quietly announced the end of the telethon.
translation.zh: 第二年 一篇不起眼的文章静静地宣布了电视马拉松的终结

translation.en: We killed it.
translation.zh: 我们把它干掉了

translation.en: And perhaps more importantly, we now had a network of disabled people
translation.zh: 而且更重要的可能是 我们现在建立起了一个残障人士的网络

translation.en: who believed in the power of collective action.
translation.zh: 我们相信集体行动的力量

translation.en: And they all had our phone number.
translation.zh: 他们都有我们的电话号码

translation.en: People kept calling to ask Alan and I what we were doing next and where.
translation.zh: 大家一直打来电话问艾伦和我接下来我们要干什么 要去哪里

translation.en: 'Cause you see, that's the thing.
translation.zh: 你知道吗 问题就在这里

translation.en: -[trumpet music] -Direct action was needed everywhere.
translation.zh: 到处都需要直接行动

translation.en: London was… it was inaccessible enough,
translation.zh: 伦敦对残疾人已经够不便的了

translation.en: but what about Manchester, Cardiff, Newcastle?
translation.zh: 可曼彻斯特呢？卡迪夫呢？纽卡斯尔呢？

translation.en: So we went on tour.
translation.zh: 于是我们进行了巡演

translation.en: Show-off.
translation.zh: 真爱炫耀

translation.en: Okay, Sue and Deepak, ready to roll?
translation.zh: 苏与迪帕克 就位了吗？准备好行动了？

translation.en: [Sue] Ready to roll. Over.
translation.zh: 准备好了 完毕

translation.en: -[Alan] Ian, Billy, Emily, ready to roll? -We're ready, mate. Let's go.
translation.zh: -伊恩、比利、艾米丽 准备好了？-嗯 我们准备好了 朋友 行动吧

translation.en: [Alan] I can see the bus coming. Right, start getting into position. Nice and slow.
translation.zh: 好了 我看到巴士开过来了开始就位 慢慢来

translation.en: Back in a mo.
translation.zh: 我去去就回

translation.en: [Alan] Give me a hand.
translation.zh: 帮我一把

translation.en: Come on, guys.
translation.zh: 拜托 别这样嘛

translation.en: [all chanting] Hey, hey! Ho, ho! Steps on buses have got to go!
translation.zh: 嘿嘿嗬嗬 阶梯巴士必须走！

translation.en: Hey, hey! Ho, ho!
translation.zh: 嘿嘿嗬嗬！

translation.en: -It's the end of my shift. -Steps on buses have got to go!
translation.zh: 别这样 我要换班了！ 必须走！嘿嘿嗬嗬！

translation.en: Hey, hey! Ho, ho!
translation.zh: 必须走！嘿嘿嗬嗬！

translation.en: [newsreader] For almost two hours, the police and fire crews tried
translation.zh: 在近乎两小时中 警察与消防队一直在试图说服这些抗议者进行放行

translation.en: to persuade the protesters to free themselves.
translation.zh: 警察与消防队一直在试图说服这些抗议者进行放行

translation.en: [Barbara] We became DAN, the Direct Action Network,
translation.zh: 我们成为了DAN “直接行动网络”

translation.en: taking our fight for access to anywhere and everywhere that shut us out.
translation.zh: 将我们对争取无障碍化的抗争带到任何将我们拒之门外的地方去

translation.en: Parts of Cardiff city center have been brought to a standstill once more
translation.zh: 卡迪夫市中心的部分地区再一次陷入了停滞

translation.en: as disabled campaigners carry out a second day of protests.
translation.zh: 残疾抗议者们进行了又一天的抗议

translation.en: [female reporter] These were scenes the police had hoped to avoid,
translation.zh: 这些状况正是警察原本希望能避免的

translation.en: but as activists handcuffed themselves to buses,
translation.zh: 但随着行动人士将自己拷在了巴士上

translation.en: they moved in, arresting two campaigners.
translation.zh: 他们采取了行动 逮捕了两名抗议者

translation.en: Others were dragged from underneath coaches
translation.zh: 还有人被警方从客车底下拽出

translation.en: in this final day of protest aimed at causing the maximum disruption.
translation.zh: 他们最后一天的抗议行为是为了对交通造成最大程度的扰乱

translation.en: -You got off at the right turning? -Yeah, we're on the right…
translation.zh: -你刚才下来的弯开对了吗？-对的 我们开对了…

translation.en: [Barbara] Right, listen. Don't be pricks.
translation.zh: 好了 听好 别犯傻

translation.en: Don't hit a policeman.
translation.zh: 别打警察

translation.en: Be mardy as hell.
translation.zh: 越愤怒越好

translation.en: I'm disabled, all right?
translation.zh: 我是残疾人 好吗？

translation.en: You gonna deny a Black man his only right of his wheelchair?
translation.zh: 你当真要阻止一个黑人使用自己轮椅的权利？

translation.en: [male newsreader] Dozens of trains were disrupted and there were six arrests.
translation.zh: 十余列火车遭到了中断并有六人被逮捕

translation.en: [female newsreader] …like second-class citizens, a claim British Rail denies.
translation.zh: …成了二等公民英国铁路否认了这一说法

translation.en: -[cheering and whistling] -Thank you very much. Thank you, Leeds!
translation.zh: 非常感谢 谢谢你 利兹！

translation.en: Manchester, you numpty!
translation.zh: 曼彻斯特 你们这帮大蠢蛋！

translation.en: It's Manchester, the north, thank God. Right, um, so, uh… [clears throat]
translation.zh: 还好是在曼彻斯特 谢天谢地 好了 那么

translation.en: This next song is called "Fixed Penalty Notice!"
translation.zh: 下一首歌的名字叫《定额罚款通知书》

translation.en: ♪ Access, access, united we're strong ♪
translation.zh: 无障碍 无障碍 我们团结起来有力量

translation.en: ♪ We won't go away 'Cause we know you're wrong ♪
translation.zh: 我们不会退却 因为你错得没商量

translation.en: ♪ Access, access You've had your way too long ♪
translation.zh: 无障碍 无障碍你们肆意妄为的时间太长

translation.en: ♪ We're here and we're gonna stay ♪
translation.zh: 我们既然来了 就不会轻易退场

translation.en: ♪ You say you have public toilets Trains and buses too ♪
translation.zh: 你说什么公共厕所 公共火车和巴士

translation.en: ♪ But when you say public You only mean you ♪
translation.zh: 但你所谓的公共不过就是你自己而已

translation.en: ♪ We're members of the public And we've got rights too ♪
translation.zh: 我们也是公众的一员我们也有自己的权利

translation.en: ♪ What we want is access now… ♪
translation.zh: 我们的要求就是立刻无障碍化

translation.en: Here we go!
translation.zh: 来了！

translation.en: [all singing] ♪ Access, access! Access, access, access! ♪ ♪ Access, access, access, ac… ♪
translation.zh: 无障碍！

translation.en: Are you drunk?
translation.zh: 你喝醉了吗？

translation.en: Alan…
translation.zh: 艾伦

translation.en: Alan, talk to me.
translation.zh: 艾伦 给我个回应

translation.en: Hmm… All right, I'll see you in a month, Mr. Holdsworth.
translation.zh: 我们下个月见 霍尔兹沃思先生

translation.en: It suits you.
translation.zh: 这很配你

translation.en: -[cheering and applause] -[band playing a few notes]
translation.zh: （格拉斯哥）

translation.en: [Alan] Yeah, right, thank you. Um…
translation.zh: 好嘞 谢谢大家

translation.en: Where are we?
translation.zh: 我们在哪儿？

translation.en: -Glasgow. -Are we?
translation.zh: -格拉斯哥-是吗？好吧

translation.en: Thank you, Glasgow.
translation.zh: 谢谢你 格拉斯哥

translation.en: This is "Fixed Penalty Notice."
translation.zh: 这首歌叫《定额罚款通知书》

translation.en: ♪ Access, access, united we're strong… ♪
translation.zh: 无障碍 无障碍 我们团结起来有力量

translation.en: [man] We want to catch the train!
translation.zh: 我们想坐火车！

translation.en: [reporter] The protest leader had thrown himself out of his wheelchair
translation.zh: 抗议的领头人自己从轮椅上跳了下来

translation.en: and was wedged between this train and the platform.
translation.zh: 结果卡在了列车与月台之间

translation.en: [man] I want to be able to go nightclubbing, to go to restaurants.
translation.zh: 我想要去泡夜店 我想要去餐厅

translation.en: I want to go to the cinema without being a fire risk.
translation.zh: 我想要去电影院的时候不会堵住消防通道

translation.en: -Can you walk? -No.
translation.zh: -你能走吗？-不能

translation.en: -Not at all? -No.
translation.zh: -完全不能？-不能

translation.en: [reporter] As the protesters were driven away by the police,
translation.zh: 在抗议者被警察赶走的同时

translation.en: British Rail, which has invested thousands of pounds at Queen Street Station on lifts,
translation.zh: 为皇后街车站投资了数千英镑建造电梯的英国铁路局

translation.en: was feeling disillusioned.
translation.zh: 也感到大失所望

translation.en: [Barbara] As the months flew by, Alan was around less and less.
translation.zh: 时间一个月一个月地过去艾伦出现得越来越少

translation.en: We took down cinemas, social clubs. We even had a good go at Harrods.
translation.zh: 我们席卷了电影院、社交俱乐部甚至还去过哈罗德百货

translation.en: But the bigger the campaign, the greater the toll on us.
translation.zh: 可随着活动的壮大我们的代价也变得越来越大

translation.en: Coming!
translation.zh: 来了！

translation.en: [politician] We have come a long way, in my view,
translation.zh: 我们确实已经取得了长足的进步在我看来

translation.en: but I don't disguise from the House for one single moment
translation.zh: 但我绝不能欺骗下议院哪怕是一秒钟

translation.en: that a very great deal remains to be done.
translation.zh: 需要改进的地方还有很多很多

translation.en: [interviewer] Was it really necessary to demonstrate in this way?
translation.zh: 可是真有必要进行如此极端的抗议吗？

translation.en: We're at the stage now where we will not take this lying down.
translation.zh: 现在已经到了一个我们不能再躺平的阶段了

translation.en: We're at the stage where we have got no room to maneuver,
translation.zh: 现在已经到了一个无法再坐以待毙的阶段

translation.en: except to demonstrate actively on the streets.
translation.zh: 我们只有积极地在街头抗议

translation.en: -[band] ♪ Access, access! ♪ -Hey!
translation.zh: -无障碍！-嘿！

translation.en: -Hey! -[band] ♪ Access, access, access! ♪ - ♪ Access, access, access… ♪ -[Alan shouting]
translation.zh: -嘿！-无障碍！

translation.en: All right!
translation.zh: 好！

translation.en: What we want
translation.zh: 我们想要的

translation.en: is access
translation.zh: 就是立刻进行

translation.en: now.
translation.zh: 无障碍化

translation.en: Alan was so angry.
translation.zh: 那时艾伦真是太愤怒了

translation.en: We all were.
translation.zh: 我们都很愤怒

translation.en: But he started to want the fight more than the result.
translation.zh: 可他开始变得更想要斗争本身 而不是结果

translation.en: We were winning.
translation.zh: 我们已经在得胜了

translation.en: We were winning each battle.
translation.zh: 每场战斗我们都在得胜

translation.en: But the war…
translation.zh: 可是整场战争…

translation.en: He didn't really want to think about the war.
translation.zh: 他并不想去思考整场战争

translation.en: So I had to.
translation.zh: 这就落到了我头上

translation.en: Bye. Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: -[Alan chuckles] -What are you two doing?
translation.zh: （1994年） -你们俩在干什么啊？-我们只是在闹着玩 对不对？

translation.en: [Alan chuckles] We're just being silly, aren't we? Aren't we? Grr!
translation.zh: -你们俩在干什么啊？-我们只是在闹着玩 对不对？ 对不对？

translation.en: [Barbara] Being silly?
translation.zh: 闹着玩？

translation.en: Hey,
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: that was someone called Victoria Scott from RADAR.
translation.zh: 刚才是维多利亚·斯科特打来的残障权利皇家协会的人

translation.en: Says there's a new Disability Discrimination Bill coming out.
translation.zh: 说有一部反残障歧视提案在起草

translation.en: -Hey! You hear me? -[Alan] Yeah, yeah, I heard you.
translation.zh: -你听到了吗？-嗯 我听到了

translation.en: I'm as skeptical as you are, but this could actually be something--
translation.zh: 听着 我跟你一样持怀疑态度但这一次可能真的会…

translation.en: I heard you. Hang on.
translation.zh: 嗯 我听到了 等一下

translation.en: Hey, Jasia, darling, why don't you go and play in the garden?
translation.zh: 嘿 雅西亚 亲爱的要不你到花园里去玩吧？

translation.en: -[Barbara] Go on, darling. -[Alan] There's a good girl. Good girl.
translation.zh: 去吧 亲爱的 乖女儿 真乖

translation.en: [sighs] I'm going out.
translation.zh: 我要出去了

translation.en: Uh, no. You said you'd look after Jasia. I've got to get to the printers.
translation.zh: 不 你说过你会照看雅西亚的我必须要去打印东西了

translation.en: Oh, fucking postcards. You know what's needed is straight action.
translation.zh: 去他妈的明信片你知道真正需要的是直接行动

translation.en: What's needed is civil rights by law.
translation.zh: 真正需要的是有法可依的公民权

translation.en: But, hey, don't concern yourself with the big things.
translation.zh: 不过呢 这种大事你就别操心了

translation.en: What does that fucking mean?
translation.zh: 你这话他妈什么意思？

translation.en: -You want to get arrested again. -I won't get arrested.
translation.zh: -你只是想再被逮捕一次-我不会被逮捕的

translation.en: Oh, you will.
translation.zh: 你会的

translation.en: I'll have to leave Jasia with my mum, go down, bail you out again--
translation.zh: 我得把雅西亚送去给我妈到局里去 再把你赎出来

translation.en: Leave me there!
translation.zh: 那就让我蹲里面啊！

translation.en: Don't look at me like that. I'm giving you everything I can.
translation.zh: 别这样看着我 我已经什么都给你了

translation.en: Is this everything? Fucking hell!
translation.zh: 这就是全部吗？真他妈要命

translation.en: And me, so ungrateful.
translation.zh: 我啊 还这么不懂感激

translation.en: You're a leader.
translation.zh: 你是个领袖

translation.en: I'm a doer. You're a twat.
translation.zh: -我是个行动者-你是个贱人

translation.en: Print your pissing postcards.
translation.zh: 去印你他妈的明信片吧

translation.en: I piss on pity, Alan. -I piss on self-pity too! -[door closes]
translation.zh: 我看不起怜悯 艾伦我也看不起自怜自艾！

translation.en: How many able-bodied people does it take to change a light bulb?
translation.zh: 换一个灯泡需要几个健全的人？

translation.en: I don't care!
translation.zh: 我不在乎！

translation.en: I'm gonna do a poem now.
translation.zh: 下面我要念一首诗

translation.en: It's about cerebral palsy, political correctness, private constables
translation.zh: 这是关于大脑性瘫痪CP政治正确PC、私人巡警PC

translation.en: and corporal punishment.
translation.zh: 和体罚CP的

translation.en: It can be PC to like CP.
translation.zh: 喜欢CP也可PC

translation.en: I like CP that is pervy.
translation.zh: 我喜欢色色的CP

translation.en: -My friend is he that has CP… -[Barbara] Excuse me!
translation.zh: -我的一个朋友 他患有CP…-失陪！

translation.en: [comedian] …into CP. Is that PC?
translation.zh: 喜欢CP 是不是PC？

translation.en: [Barbara] Excuse me.
translation.zh: 打扰

translation.en: [comedian] If he had CP with a PC into CP, like all PCs,
translation.zh: 如果他被一个喜欢CP的PC进行了CP 就像所有的PC

translation.en: PC, might not he beat him,
